description_html:
ONE ILLUMINATES™ART: Our picture lights marry elegant design with flawless functionality and ease of installation.

“The inspiration for designing this collection came after years of struggling to find quality lighting fixtures that met my clients’ needs. I constantly searched for options that offered seamless light quality, beam control and perfect color temperature, as well as the level of aesthetic and craft my clients and I expect.” Nathan Orsman, founder One Illuminates.

Fixtures are offered in three series: HELD, CHAMFER and GRASP. Features include 110-volt driverless operation, 0 to 100% dimming, consistent color temperature and a unique 40° beam angle. Further control of the light coverage comes via our proprietary internally articulating LED unit. Our products are fully UL and CE compliant.

Fixtures are offered in three standard sizes and a variety of finishes on a 4 - 6 week lead time, as well as made-to-order with custom sizes and finishes.

These versatile fixtures can be seamlessly incorporated into new construction and existing spaces.
